Dr. Toast - "Interdimensional Laundry" (2001)

posted August 7, 2001 | music, releases



A bit darker, more experimental, maybe a bit less "accessible" than my other stuff. But be sure to give a listen to "We Wouldn't Have Any Weather" and "I'm Afraid I Can't Do That"
